roleset.name: remove an amino group from an organic compound

role.descr: product of deamination (not the ammonia molecule)

example.name: example with result and instrument
example.text: Adenosine is deaminated via adenosine deaminase to inosine plus ammonia.
example.note: By definition, deaminatation also produces ammonia.

example.name: intentional agent
example.text: To address this possibility, we deaminated genomic DNA.
